scripts.vite: pnpm --filter remote dev & pnpm --filter remote2 dev & wait-on tcp:3000 & wait-on tcp:3002 && pnpm --filter host dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter remote build && pnpm --filter remote2 build && pnpm --filter host build
scripts.preview: pnpm --filter remote preview & pnpm --filter remote2 preview & pnpm --filter host preview
